definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: You can by hand small pushes, so that lymph flow more smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 可以用手輕輕地推按，使淋巴的流動更順暢。

sentences.english: This product sells well, there are no goods remaining every month.
sentences.chinese: 這種產品銷路順暢，基本上每月都是滿產滿銷。

sentences.english: They'll pay less and the data network will function more smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 那就是他們會話的更少，同時通信網絡將會更加順暢。

sentences.english: There was so little traffic that Stone got home from work in half of the usual time.
sentences.chinese: 交通順暢，史東只用了平常一半的時間就到家了。

sentences.english: SCOOT's primary aim is keep traffic flowing smoothly and pedestrians safe.
sentences.chinese: SCOOT的首要目標是保持交通順暢和步行者安全。

sentences.english: China and ASEAN countries keep unimpeded communication on relevant issue.
sentences.chinese: 中國與東盟各國就有關問題保持着順暢的溝通。

sentences.english: "Bi Shun " has the meaning of thinking of writing is going on smoothly and without obstacles.
sentences.chinese: 筆順就是寫作思路順暢，沒有障礙的意思。

sentences.english: The car can keep running without the tune-ups, but it won't run as smoothly and efficiently as you'd like.
sentences.chinese: 沒有調整汽車也能開，但是不會開得那麼順暢和有效。

sentences.english: The more liquid a market, after all, the more smoothly it should function.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結底，市場流動性越好，其運行也就應該越順暢。

sentences.english: Say goodbye to lawless driving, ensure the smooth flow of traffic.
sentences.chinese: 告別違章行車，保證交通順暢。

sentences.english: I had to sleep propped up on pillows so I could breathe.
sentences.chinese: 睡覺時必須得斜靠在枕頭上才能呼吸順暢。

sentences.english: Also, probiotics and magnesium vitamins often help keep your body on a healthy, digestive roll.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌和鎂維生素使你的消化系統順暢健康地運作。

sentences.english: It allows administrators to manage the system and ensure things are running smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 它讓管理員可以管理系統，確保系統運行順暢。

sentences.english: BIf the traffic is OK, it should take about 30 minutes by taxi.
sentences.chinese: B如果交通順暢的話，乘出租車30分鐘就到了。

sentences.english: Nicked insert lowers and disperses resistance at milling, and enables high feed rate by restraining chattering.
sentences.chinese: 專用斷屑槽切削抵抗小，提高切削排出順暢性。

definition: to be capable of/to be able to/can
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
